attributes.action: Increase the minimum wage to help lift families out of poverty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: An increase in the minimum wage would help many families to lift themselves out of poverty, It would enable Families to move off tax credits and benefits.The unemployed and low income families would then see that working would be beneficial to them, thus breaking the benefit dependency culture that surrounds the poor,and disenfranchised.
